comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15706?focusedCommentId=17504717) by Yibo Cai (yibocai):*
Hi `[~lidavidm]`, I saw you filed some issues about ucx. I have some colleagues working at ucx as core maintainers. Actually, the idea of integrating ucx into flightrpc is from [Pavel Shamis](https://github.com/shamisp) in an internal tech meeting. Ping me if you met with some difficulties in ucx and need help. I think Pavel will be okay to give some support (unfortunately I have little knowledge about ucx).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15706?focusedCommentId=17504925) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Thanks for the offer! I actually was introduced to Pavel through a colleague of mine and he has been advising on the approach.
